body:
I need help guys.

I'm stuck awake at 12:55am and I can't fall asleep
(don't take naps)
Help? How do I fall asleep an why am I still awake?
body_tagged:
I need help guys.

I'm stuck awake at 12:55am and I can't fall asleep
(don't take naps)
Help? How do I fall asleep an why am I still awake?
title: Help?

replies.body: Make sure your bedroom is clean and tidy ;)
replies.body_tagged: Make sure your bedroom is clean and tidy ;)

replies.body: Don't use handys/computers/TVs etc when you're going to sleep. And don't go to bed when you're not tired because you can't sleep without being tired a little bit
replies.body_tagged: Don't use handys/computers/TVs etc when you're going to sleep. And don't go to bed when you're not tired because you can't sleep without being tired a little bit

replies.body: Eat something warm, but nothing with sugar. It should soothe your body a little.
replies.body_tagged: Eat something warm, but nothing with sugar. It should soothe your body a little.
